replies.body: It was amazing meeting everyone at PAX! Can it be PAX every weekend?!?!?
promise to say hi to me next year!!!
I wish! Though I was so exhausted from wearing Renekton and Kha'zix that the following day I was sore as can be! lol
I feel you there. Cosplay for 4 days is hard, but you looked amazing!
Thanks for having us <3
Does anyone know who that Zoe is?! She's adorable! {{champion:142}}

wanna know the coolest thing about that video........ its that I couldn't spot a single sour face in the whole crowd. and even if we lose our tempers sometimes just look how very connected we are #LEAGUEISSTILLALIVE
I love how there always one person #@*&ing up the Genyu Force pose, GJ Noob jk ^.~*
Can we get a Pax South??? Texas is craving it!!
Had an amazing PAX! Loved meeting so many other players, and a few streamers. I think my favorite cosplay were the two lovely {{champion:150}}
As one of the Gnar's thank you! I'm also glad you had fun finding a team and meeting up IRL
I want one of those bot lane shirts! I wish I had money to go to pax! {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Mahou ojisan！
The akali cosplay is @tetsu.chi on instagram
That akali is so well done wow
let me trade champion shards for key fragments please.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:sg-syndra}}
{{champion:432}}
Looks like an absolute blast was had by both the Riot team and fans! Super jelly I wasn't there!
I wish Riot dished out some pax skin for Pax East. :(
hmm, they did give out god staff Jax, but it wasn't a limited skin or anything like PAX Sivir. Kinda stinks, but I can't complain about a free skin, even for a champ I don't play. :)
I suppose but I dislike Riot's Bias for Pax West. They went all out on that one. Pax east? Meh
I hope they have this up at Pax (Prime)west too!
Creator & Cospitality Lounge I was literally standing next to them taking pictures at Pax on the 6th one with Poke, Braum, Azir and Kindred. So cool!
